dialogs.responseText: Hi. Don't mind me, I'm just a people watcher. Oh, also if you're headed to Koncave City, I have a passport I'd trade you.
I don't need money. I do, however, have a very specific item I am gathering. Ever heard of Great Tree seeds?
Great, then I don't need to explain. I need 20 of them.

Further down in the caves there you'll find a number of disgusting creatures called root dwellers. They collect any seeds from the tree and hold on to them as treasures. It's not common to find a root dweller with a seed, so I'm having trouble finding them.
Okay, let me know when you get them and we can trade.
Okay, let me know when you get them and we can trade.
